column1: in memory of richie todd crateau -- gary kelley's add'vantage funeral and cremation service| first: last: richie todd crateau february 21
column6: 2015 in tulsa. he was born february 21
column7: 1959 to don and carol (desmariais) crateau in seattle
column8: washington. mr. crateau was a construction laborer by trade. no services planned. condolences may be posted to the guestbook located on this page. photographs and may also be submitted to this online memorial. gary kelley'sadd'vantage funeral and cremation service9761 east 31st street. tulsa
